name: Polyphonic Parameters
description: Common parameters found in polyphonic synthesizer algorithms for managing voices, unison, spread, and performance controls.

parameters.name: Unison
parameters.description: Number of unison voices per triggered note.

parameters.name: Output spread
parameters.description: Stereo output spread amount for voices.

parameters.name: Max voices
parameters.description: Maximum number of simultaneous voices allowed (may be limited by algorithm specification).

parameters.name: Bend range
parameters.description: MIDI pitch bend range in semitones.
